title: W3C Technical Architecture Group-relevant MDN issues
description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by W3C Technical Architecture Group

items.content_html:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CSS/RegisterProperty

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

Example

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

The example claims to demonstrate how this method call is useful and the colour gradient only works when using the method.

What did you expect to see?

A difference that the method makes, as explained. But there isn't one. Both gradients work just fine. What's the use of this method?

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

No response

Do you have anything more you want to share?

Also, the page says that the method is experimental, but that note is missing from the CSS overview page and also the method list in the left side panel. This seems inconsistent.

MDN metadata

items.title: [css-properties-values-api-1] CSS.registerProperty seems useless
